Module com.example.schedulingsystem
Package Database

Class CustomerCRUD

java.lang.Object
Database.PatientCRUD
public class CustomerCRUD extends Object
This is the CustomerCRUD class! This performs all the insert, update and delete function to the database for the patient table! It also gets data from the database for reports!

  • Method Details

    • getAllCustomer

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer> getAllCustomer() throws Exception
      getAllCustomer The getAllCustomer is a method that gets all the customers from the database and adds it to an observable list!
      Returns:
      This method returns an observable list of Customer for all customers!
      Throws:
      Exception - IOException is needed in case of failure!

    • insertCustomer

      public static void insertCustomer(int customerId, String customerName, String customerAddress, String postalCode, String phoneNumber, Timestamp createDate, String createBy, Timestamp lastUpdate, String lastUpdatedBy, int divisionId)
      insertCustomer The insertCustomer is a method that perform an insert statement to add a valid patient to the database!
      Parameters:
      customerId - A parameter of customerId is passed in for the patient id!
      customerName - A parameter of customerName is passed in for the patient name!
      customerAddress - A parameter of address is passed in for the patient's address!
      postalCode - A parameter of postalCode is passed in for the patient's postal code!
      phoneNumber - A parameter of phoneNumber is passed in for the patient's phone number!
      createDate - A parameter of createDate is passed in for the creation date!
      createBy - A parameter of createBy is passed in for the user's name!
      lastUpdate - A parameter of lastUpdate is passed in for the update date!
      lastUpdatedBy - A parameter of lastUpdatedBy is passed in for the user's name!
      divisionId - A parameter of divisionId is passed in for the division id!

      public static void updateCustomer(int customerId, String customerName, String address, String postalCode, String phoneNumber, Timestamp createDate, String createBy, Timestamp lastUpdate, String lastUpdatedBy, int divisionId)
      updateCustomer The updateCustomer is a method that perform an update statement to update a valid patient to the database!
      Parameters:
      customerId - A parameter of customerId is passed in for the patient id!
      customerName - A parameter of customerName is passed in for the patient name!
      address - A parameter of address is passed in for the patient's address!

      lastUpdate - A parameter of lastUpdate is passed in for the update date!
      lastUpdatedBy - A parameter of lastUpdatedBy is passed in for the user's name!
      divisionId - A parameter of divisionId is passed in for the division id!

    • deleteCustomer

      public static boolean deleteCustomer(Customer selectedPatient) throws Exception
      deleteCustomer The deleteCustomer is a method that perform a deleteCustomer statement to update a valid patient to the database!
      Parameters:
      selectedPatient - A parameter of the selected patient is passed in to know which patient to delete!
      Returns:
      This method returns a true or false value!
      Throws:
      Exception - Exception is needed in case of failure!
